answers.answer: Its a chance u could not have it again i had preeclampsia with my first son at 31 weeks it was protein in my urine i got induced at 33 weeks. Im 33 weeks pregnant with my second son and so far no sign of preeclampsia every pregnancy is different.

No its not true,every pregnancy is different..preclampsia is a possibility for every pregnant woman really but just because you get it in one pregnancy theres nothing to suggest you will get it for sure in subsquent pregnancies

Not true, i had with my first and im overdue 2 days with my second and no preeclampsia this time. Doc told me it was very unlikely i would develop with this pregnancy by the time i reached 35 weeks bc no signs of it.

question: I've heard that if you have this with your first pregnancy then you will have it with every one after that. Is this true or is there a chance you could not have it again??
title: Preclampsia?
